Defines class BaseConfig with attribute(s) and method(s). Base initial configuration for mail service.

class app_server.configuration.mail.BaseConfig[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class BaseConfig with attribute(s) and method(s). Base initial configuration for mail service.

It defines:

attributes:
MAIL_SERVER - Mail server (default: Google).
MAIL_PORT - Mail port.
MAIL_USE_SSL - Use SSL (True/False).
methods:
None
MAIL_PORT: int = 465¶
MAIL_SERVER: str = 'smtp.gmail.com'¶
MAIL_USE_SSL: bool = True¶
